lead_paragraph: Ferrari head into Formula One’s annual break facing a tall order to turn things around in time for the second half of a season that promised much but has so far delivered little.

headline.print_headline: Fading Ferrari Face Summer of Introspection
headline.main: Fading Ferrari Face Summer of Introspection

snippet: Ferrari head into Formula One’s annual break facing a tall order to turn things around in time for the second half of a season that promised much but has so far delivered little....
